name: Awesome Rat In Awesome Space
description:
You are stuck near an alien planet after a warp drive malfunction! And you are out of fuel! 

Keep your orbit using your ammunition, customize your ship for optimal movement, fight enemies and escape with their fuel!

CONTROLS:
Mouse: aim with the Hull Gun

I: open inventory

Q, W, E, R: fire secondary modules

CREDITS

Known bugs:

  • It seems like enemies don't spawn correctly when you respawn, so you might have to restart. Sorry!
